title: Antique Guns The Collector's Guide (gnv64)
description: Antique Guns - The Collector's Guide John E. Traister Stoeger Publishing Company | 1989 | ISBN-10: 0883171449 | scanned PDF | 276 Pages | 46.8 mb Years in its preparation, this updated guide covers a vast spectrum of pre-1900 firearms manufactured by U.S. gunmakers as well as Canadian, French, German, Belgian, Spanish, and other foreign firms. Offers detailed descriptions, dates of production, and current values. Illustrations. GONTENTS PREFACE 5 ACKNOWLEDGMENTS 6 ABOUT THE AUTHOR 9 COLLECTING ANTIQUE GUNS 13 CHAPTER 1 — HANDGUNS 17 Gunmakers A to Z 19 American Kentucky Flintlock Pistols 71 Confederate Handguns 78 U.S. Military Handguns 79 CHAPTER 2 — RIFLES 91 Gunmakers A to Z 93 American Kentucky Flintlock Rifles 138 Confederate Military Rifles 155 U.S. Military Flintlock Rifles 158 U.S. Military Single Shot Breechloading Carbines 161 CHAPTER 3 — SHOTGUNS 165 Gunmakers A to Z 167 CHAPTER 4 — BLACKPOWDER REPLICAS 189 Gunmakers A to Z 191 CHAPTER 5 — OBSOLETE CARTRIDGES 239 Centerfire Rifle Cartridges 241 Obsolete Metric Cartridges 254 Rimfire Cartridges 255 Shotshells 258 BIBLIOGRAPHY 259 INDEX 261 KEY TO COVER FIREARMS 271 https://s17.postimg.org/k80huur3z/Antique_Guns_-_The_Collector_s_Guide.jpg
